EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Webinar: The Power of CF and K8s in a Single Platform
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don't miss your chance to register for the upcoming live webinar: PCF - The Power of Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes in a Single Platform
Date: 13 March 2019 Time: 3:30pm NZDT / 1:30pm AEDT / 10:30am SGT Register Now: https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-13-pcf-the-power-of-cloud-foundry-and-kubernetes-in-a-single-platform-webinar
When venturing into the world of cloud-native applications and microservices, organisations are faced with an array of challenges. Many struggle with how to best leverage container technologies, which one to pick and the implications for the business. Then thereâ€™s what cloud to run it on - and why do you even need to make that decision upfront. Finally, what skills do your developers and operations teams need to succeed in this new world.
Join us on this webinar as we demystify the complexities associated with leveraging Cloud Foundry, Kubernetes and Knative effectively, as well as the required platform to enable you to run and manage containers at scale.
Key Highlights: - Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes on Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) - How PCF can simplify your technology toolbox - Use cases with PCF (e.g. Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes)
Featured Speakers: - David Kari, Head of Platform Architecture ANZ, Pivotal - Pas Apicella, Advisory Platform Architect APJ, Pivotal
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
